message.raw:
I could not fix the third party DAE loader we're using without a lot of effort to use scales correctly (it applied the scale to the translations of the next mesh transforms in a DAE file), so I changed the DAE files to be in meter coordinates and they look good in both Gazebo and our UI now.

I've attached the changed meshes and would like to request they be included in the official drcsim before the freeze, if possible.
